https://tmrev.io/movie/418685-Behind 'The Cove' 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fGFibxOZu6qF5Kg1aHdfetsTGSd.jpg Negative media coverage on the never-ending whaling issue prompted first-time documentary filmmaker Keiko Yagi to find out more about the topic. With no budget, limited experience in filmmaking, no fluency in English, but armed with a video camera and a strong desire to find out about the truth of the matter on whaling, Yagi started her research. Behind 'The Cove'
